insert into codeTracker.meta_package ( uuid, package_name, module_name, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.packageName}, #{item.moduleName}, #{commonInfo.startCommit}, #{commonInfo.startCommitDate}, #{commonInfo.endCommit}, #{commonInfo.endCommitDate}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{item.version} )

insert into codeTracker.raw_package ( uuid, root_uuid, version, change_relation, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, parent_commit, repo_uuid, branch ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.rootUuid}, #{item.version}, #{item.changeStatus}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.committer}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{commonInfo.parentCommit}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{commonInfo.branch} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from codeTracker.meta_package where module_name = #{moduleName} and package_name = #{packageName} and repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and branch = #{branch} order by version desc limit 1
select commitid from codeTracker.raw_package where repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and branch = #{branch} order by commit_date desc limit 1;
